description:
Im here to seek someone to spoil and be spoiled. Life is great and I live it to the fullest. I keep my norms but Im no angel. Fun and laughter is my motto and no time for jealousy and fighting. Im honest and love people, nature and outdoors. I love being at home aswell. I work hard and play hard. Im very young at heart.
I keep fit and like a woman that look well after herself.
